verbose_text: In Drosophila, the termini are patterned via the localized activation of the receptor tyrosine kinase Torso (Tor) by its ligand Trunk (Trk) which results in expression of the transcription factors Tailless (Tll) and Huckebein at the anterior and posterior of the embryo.
evidence: activation of the receptor tyrosine kinase Torso (Tor) by its ligand Trunk (Trk
